version_description:
Bus ticket booking on mStore. Get discounts on every booking.
Open a recurring deposit (RD) in just 2 steps. 
Add Billers & set Auto Pay to get bills paid automatically. 
Minor bug fixes.

Bus ticket booking on mStore. Get discounts on every booking.
Open a recurring deposit (RD) in just 2 steps. 
Add Billers & set Auto Pay to get bills paid automatically. 
Minor bug fixes.

This update carries fixes for minor bugs and crashes in Bill Pay, Credit Card and Investment sections

• Crash issue on Investment Redemption has been fixed
• Bug with month selection in custom date in Statement Request corrected
• Credit Card Account Summary will show details of only primary cards
• Issue faced by Credit card customers during Bill payments and Mobile/DTH recharge has been fixed
• Credit card made as default option to make Bill payments and Mobile/DTH recharge

This update carries fixes for minor bugs and crashes in Bill Pay, Credit Card and Investment sections

• Crash issue on Investment Redemption has been fixed
• Bug with month selection in custom date in Statement Request corrected
• Credit Card Account Summary will show details of only primary cards
• Issue faced by Credit card customers during Bill payments and Mobile/DTH recharge has been fixed
• Credit card made as default option to make Bill payments and Mobile/DTH recharge

Changes made to on-board ING Vysya (now Kotak) customers to Kotak Mobile Banking App. If you are an ING Vysya (now Kotak) customer, you can download the app now but please activate the app after the systems are migrated.

Changes made to on-board ING Vysya (now Kotak) customers to Kotak Mobile Banking App. If you are an ING Vysya (now Kotak) customer, you can download the app now but please activate the app after the systems are migrated.

Bug Fixes and Minor Enhancements
Bug Fixes and Minor Enhancements

We have listened to your feedback and completely re-designed the Payment experience. Some of the new features are:

· Now you don’t need to add Transfer types (IMPS, NEFT, RTGS) separately while adding a beneficiary.
· 'Favourites' feature – Transfer funds without searching for beneficiary.
· 'Pay' feature – In case of an incoming transaction, send money back with just a click.
· Send Receipt – Option to send a transfer receipt via SMS / Whatsapp / Email etc.
· Go to new ‘’Payments’’ tab to experience it.

We have listened to your feedback and completely re-designed the Payment experience. Some of the new features are:

· Now you don’t need to add Transfer types (IMPS, NEFT, RTGS) separately while adding a beneficiary.
· 'Favourites' feature – Transfer funds without searching for beneficiary.
· 'Pay' feature – In case of an incoming transaction, send money back with just a click.
· Send Receipt – Option to send a transfer receipt via SMS / Whatsapp / Email etc.
· Go to new ‘’Payments’’ tab to experience it.
Bug Fixes and Minor Enhancements.
Bug Fixes and Minor Enhancements.

· Make payments by scanning UPI QR in Scan & Pay option.
· New service requests related to Account, Profile and Deposits

· A new insurance section

· Login for Loan customers

Your Account & credit card statements are just a tap away with ‘eStatement’
‘Cardless Cash Withdrawal(IMT)’ lets you withdraw cash from any Kotak Bank ATM without using your physical card
Speed & stability matters, so we have improved it further to give you a better banking experience

• Sending money to someone just got easy! Introducing ‘Pay Your Contact’ feature on the app. Now send money to your phone contacts irrespective of the payment apps or bank they’re using
• 'Credit Card Overview' lets you manage your Credit Card with an improved experience
• Push Notification service has been enhanced to serve you better
• Speed and stability matters, so we have improved it further to give you a better banking experience

• Sending money to someone just got easy! Introducing ‘Pay Your Contact’ feature on the app. Now send money to your phone contacts irrespective of the payment apps or bank they’re using
• 'Credit Card Overview' lets you manage your Credit Card with an improved experience
• Push Notification service has been enhanced to serve you better

'Pay Again' option in 'Pay Your Contact' for repeat payments!
Speed & Stability matters, so we have improved it further to give you a better banking experience.

'Pay Again' option in 'Pay Your Contact' for repeat payments!
Speed & Stability matters, so we have improved it further to give you a better banking experience.

• You can now gift wrap & send a greeting as part of your Money transfer message through Pay your contact. This new feature will allow you to send a personal note & greetings attached to your money transfer for events like Raksha Bandhan, Diwali, Christmas, Birthdays, Anniversaries & any special occasion!
• Improved Homepage navigation experience
• Enabled Hindi language support for Home Page, Account Activity, Account Overview & Payments.
• As our continuous endeavour, we have deployed some minor fixes to make the app faster & more stable.

• You can now gift wrap & send a greeting as part of your Money transfer message through Pay your contact.
